name: Beat bricks
description:
This game is very interesting, using the rebound principle of objects to play the game. The new form of play is particularly interesting. Players can master their rebound movement trajectory based on their physical knowledge or life experience, better operation and performance, and achieve the game goals. The sense of game operation skills is stronger, and it will be more interesting!

Game Description

1. The game screen is simple, with colored rings of various colors interlaced together, which is still quite beautiful.

2. Control the bounce of small balls and choose a good angle so that these balls can be hit.

3. The movement of the ball is not irregular, and various bounces actually follow some physical principles, making it easy to control.
